item.title: Version 1.1.17
item.description:
What’s New in v1.1.17+44 1.Active scenario shown on Settings page 2.Operator & alliance info listed with active periods 3.Only deals from the selected scenario are displayed 4.Unified number formatting: 4–6 digits → full number 7–9 digits → M (2 decimals) 10–12 digits → B (2 decimals) 5.“Clear All” button added to deal status filter
Fixes: 1.Corrected country deal counts 2.Faster login (2–5s) 3.Days to expire calculation fixed, including leap years 4.Standardized deal card formatting

item.title: Version 1.1.16
item.description:
What’s New in v1.1.16+43 New Features 1.Commitment now shown directly in Deal Cards. 2.Deal Cards display current status. 3.New filter: sort deals by status. 4.Financial Overview shows only this year (Receivable/Payable). 5.Operator search includes PMN Code. 6.Alliance Name shown in Deal Cards.
Fixes & Improvements 1.Faster, more accurate search with partial match support. 2.Fixed layout issues on Samsung S23/S24/S25. 3.Search reset works properly. 4.Corrected Net Position values on Global Map.
